text: Ioannis Andreou was a Greek swimmer. He competed at the 1896 Summer Olympics in Athens. Andreou competed in the 1,200 metres freestyle event. He placed second of the seven swimmers, with a time of 21:03.4. The winner, Alfréd Hajós, had finished in 18:22.2. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Greek male swimmers Category:Swimmers at the 1896 Summer Olympics Category:19th-century sportsmen Category:Olympic swimmers of Greece Category:Olympic silver medalists for Greece Category:Olympic silver medalists in swimming Category:Medalists at the 1896 Summer Olympics Category:Male freestyle swimmers
title: Ioannis Andreou
